gov.ca.water.calgui
Class RunUtils

java.lang.Object
  gov.ca.water.calgui.RunUtils

public class RunUtils
extends java.lang.Object

The RunUtils class contains the necessary methods for doing a single, batch, or WSIDI run. The methods were extracted from FileAction.java - the action listener for the Run dashboard.

Author:
drucinski, tslawecki

doSingleAsWSIDI

public static void doSingleAsWSIDI(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae,
                                   javax.swing.JPanel mainmenu,
                                   java.lang.String scen)
Validates scenario currently in memory and then saves and runs WSI-DI generation. THis is done by calling doSingleEither with the boolean isWSIDI set to true.

mainmenu -
